name: ORR Demo
detailed_description: Demo is single player only. Demo includes four championship races, each with a secret objective that unlocks a special level(4 races, 4 special levels). The levels have no blocked areas and are fully explorable, but most only have one hidden goal(They are mostly empty at this point). This is an early build and the game will likely change, but this demo should be considered as final game quality.
about_the_game: Demo is single player only. Demo includes four championship races, each with a secret objective that unlocks a special level(4 races, 4 special levels). The levels have no blocked areas and are fully explorable, but most only have one hidden goal(They are mostly empty at this point). This is an early build and the game will likely change, but this demo should be considered as final game quality.
short_description: ORR is an off road racing game with open world exploration.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64bit Versions of Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4690 or AMD FX 8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 780 or AMD R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible soundcard

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
